name: Cubic Tower
description:
Build your own tower? Challenge the classic arcade game, but watch out – the digital edition has some new tricks! 

Featuring:

  • Build forever in Endless.
  • Earn coins to buy boosts!
  • Different colored blocks.
  • Game center – become king of the arcade!

What are you waiting for? Give it a try, it’s harder than it looks!

Game available for iOS, tvOS, Android, Android TV, Linux, macOS, Windows - http://www.wildspike.com/cubic-tower.html
